column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////- Croissant - $3.75 - this is probably the prettiest but average to below average tasting croissant I've ever had. The croissant is light and fluffy on the inside
column2: but it was not as buttery as I would have liked. Also
column3: the outer layers were slightly overbaked
column4: so the slightly burnt flavor was overtaking the croissant. This probably would have tasted better if it were warm though.
